title: Welcome to the Bitshares NFT issuance tool!
desc: The following features are available for the Bitshares blockchains!
footer: To make full use of the feature set available in this tool, the Bitshares BEET multiwallet is required.

createNFT.title: Create a new NFT
createNFT.desc: Create a new NFT on the Bitshares blockchain

editNFT.title: Edit an existing NFT
editNFT.desc: Edit an existing NFT on the Bitshares blockchain

issueNFT.title: Issue an NFT
issueNFT.desc: Issue an NFT on the Bitshares blockchain

load.title: Load a draft NFT
load.desc: Continue creating an NFT from a draft

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.desc: Learn more about NFTs, the Bitshares blockchain and the BEET multiwallet
